Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I' ve build a Soyuz in the last days and I want to release it here too! (already on KerbalX: klick here)

First some pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I know - doesn' t relly look like a Soyuz but does its thing!

Description:

It' s tested for a station on an orbit from about 300km but could go even further!The root part is the Mark1-2Pod. The Soyuz is built in KSP version 1.0.4.

For the action groups: please look them up yourself

Download:

Download here - Soyuz (Stock) v1.0

Also pls leave some comments and improvements for the craft!

Very cool!, however i don't think the real Soyuz had SRBs, and it thought it had many small engines....

Other than that great rocket!
For improvements, I would use gigantor solar arrays instead of the 1x6 panels. I think it makes it look more...... soyuzyyy.
